title: Call a friend
content: Talking to another person about your problems, or listening to someone else’s problems for a while, can help improve your mood or change the way you think.

title: Cook dinner for yourself and send your friends a photo
content: Pure Wow can help you brainstorm some simple dishes.

title: Join an online book club or reading group.
content: Bustle can direct you to a wide variety of book clubs!

title: Call a family member
content: Talking to another person about your problems, or listening to someone else’s problems for a while, can help improve your mood or change the way you think.

title: Write a email to someone you care about
Set up a Video Chat with friends
Set up a Video Chat with family
Take a free online class
content: Harvard University offers free online courses!

title: Start a group chat online. Watch and discuss a live feed of an online music performance
content: Sofar hosts live performances of artists around the globe

title: Start a group chat online. Watch and discuss an online theater performance
content: Broadway HD has a library of over 300 productions you can watch from home.

title: Start a group chat online. Watch a movie at the same time.
content: Rotten Tomatoes has a list of 200 essential movies to watch from the 1920s to today!

title: Play an online game with friends or family.
content: Oprah Winfrey’s magazine has a list of the top 20 best games to play with friends while social distancing.

title: Message an old friend on social media
